text: Lawrence David Brown (16 December 1940 â€“ 21 February 2018)Lawrence D. Brown was an American educator and statistic analyzer. Miers Busch Professor and Professor of Statistics at the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. He was president of the Institute of Mathematical Statistics in 1992-93. He was elected to the American Academy of Arts and Sciences in 2013.Newly elected members , American Academy of Arts and Sciences, April 2013, retrieved 2013-04-24. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Educators from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Philadelphia Category:Educators from Philadelphia
